sentence.Network_en: Willowherb, tender and wistful , like a pink sunset cloud, was not slow to follow.
sentence.Network_cn: 报春花娇娜多姿, 犹如粉红色的晚霞, 紧接着亮相.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 柳叶菜(Willowherb) 和毛地黄一样,在这个时间和区域争夺生存空间,所以繁殖和生长也相当的快。 不同植物间的竞争,寿命长的为赢家.
willowherb 柳兰, willowherb 柳草, willowherb 柳叶菜属

means.word_mean: 1. a plant of the genus Epilobium having pink or yellow flowers and seeds with silky hairs

auth_sentence.content: He hunkered down behind the rosebay willowherb.
